overview: Collection of eight short films from Nova. "Jeff And Frank" — When Frank found out Jeff's parents where going to be gone the whole day, he invited himself into the house. "Jogging Off" — Jogger Randy decides to take a shortcut and ends up in sunbather David's backyard. "Dale And Ed" — Dale, a Marine on a three-day pass, starts playing around in the shower with his younger brother, Ed. "Jerry And Richard" — These two lovers just can't keep their hands off each other, even in the bathtub. "Jon And Jack" — Two stud athletes learn about man-to-man sex in their frat house. "The Carpenter Comes" — Carpenter David stops by to take some measurements for a new storage cabinet, but homeowner Mario has other ideas. "Paul And Neil" — A couple of young, hot rock singers discover each other while touring and suck and fuck every chance they get. "Frank And Todd" — Frank can never get enough cock, but finally he meets a dude who can keep up with him.
title: Intimate Moments
